instructions:
This is the  character sheet for'GODSEND Agenda', by Khepera Publishing.

* [GODSEND-Agenda-3-Beta-Test on DriveThuRPG](https://www.drivethrurpg.com/product/305357/GODSEND-Agenda-3-Beta-Test?affiliate_id=135577)

useroptions.description: When checked, the rolls made from the sheet are only visible to the player and the GM.
If active, sheet will as for dice modifiers before every roll.
